Package ganymede.shell

Interface Magic

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AnnotatedMagic, AnnotatedScriptEngineMagic
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMagic, AbstractPropertiesMagic, AbstractScriptEngineMagic, Bash, Classpath, Env, FreeMarker, Groovy, Handlebars, HTML, Java, Javascript, JShell, Kotlin, Magics, Markdown, Perl, POM, Ruby, Scala, Script, Sh, SQL, SysProperties, Thymeleaf, Velocity
    public interface Magic
    Magic service interface.
    Author:
    Allen D. Ball

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  Magic.Application
      Magic Application instance to parse code, find Magic, and execute.

        The names.

        Method to get the description of this Magic.

      • getUsage

        String getUsage()
        Method to get the usage of this Magic.
        Returns:
        The usage.

      • execute

        default void execute​(Shell shell,
                     InputStream in,
                     PrintStream out,
                     PrintStream err,
                     String line0,
                     String code)
              throws Exception
        Shell execution method. Default implementation sends to the execute(String,String) method in the JShell instance.
        Parameters:
        shell - The Shell.
        in - The in InputStream.
        out - The out PrintStream.
        err - The err PrintStream.
        line0 - The initial magic line.
        code - The remainder of the cell.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • isComplete

        Message.completeness isComplete​(String line0,
                                String code)
        Method to determine code's completeness.
        Parameters:
        line0 - The initial magic line.
        code - The code to execute.
        Returns:
        The code's completeness.

      • configure

        void configure​(NotebookContext context)
        JShell configuation method.
        Parameters:
        context - The NotebookContext.

      • execute

        void execute​(String line0,
             String code)
      throws Exception
        JShell execution method.
        Parameters:
        line0 - The initial magic line.
        code - The remainder of the cell.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • isCellMagic

        static boolean isCellMagic​(String code)
        Method to determine if the code is cell magic (starts with '%%').
        Parameters:
        code - The code to test.
        Returns:
        true if cell magic; false otherwise.

      • getCellMagicCommand

        static String[] getCellMagicCommand​(String code)
        Method to parse a cell magic command. The code must start with "%%". "#" to the EOL is a comment. The command is either a word or a single punctuation character. Words may be quoted with double quotes.
        Parameters:
        code - The code to parse.
        Returns:
        The array of command arguments.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the magic line can't be parsed.
